title: anyone elss haveing problems with instaling league ?
body: I don't know about u but for some reason my league pvp.net didn't work so I uninstalled it but now im trying to install it put the links to them wont instal the game any reason why riot admins ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you getting any errors when attempting to install the game?
Have you tried completely [reinstalling league of legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
